name: yapd
summary: Yet another PHP to DAO conversion software
short_description:
Imagine you want to start a new project in PHP using MySQL as a DB server. You create your tables and then the first thing you should do is... Create the DAO files. And this is the boring, error prone part of your system.

yapd will do it for you: it will read your schema in MySQL and it will create four files for you: * A file for the data object * A file for the interface * The DAO file * The file that extends the DAO files (for custom queries) I've used the fantastic phpdao software and I have fixed some bugs, added more phpdoc elements and used PHP MySQL's PDO system (instead of the deprecated mysql php driver)
